subject: Re: [R] 3D plots with data.frame
body:
You could try the function 'plot3d', in package 'rgl':

library(rgl)
?plot3d
x<-data.frame(a=rnorm(100),b=rnorm(100),c=rnorm(100))
plot3d(x$a,x$b,x$c)

Jose
